body_html:
@dgovil @mopimoi I also believe this is a Path issue.
I have the following relevant directories in PATH on my machine:

C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\bin
C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\libnvvp
C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\extras\CUPTI\libx64
C:\Program Files (x86)\NVIDIA Corporation\PhysX\Common
c:\tools\cuda\bin   # this is for cudnn64_6.dll
C:\Program Files\Anaconda3
C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\Scripts
C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\Library\bin

Can you please check if you have all corresponding directories in PATH?

body:
@dgovil @mopimoi I also believe this is a Path issue.
I have the following relevant directories in PATH on my machine:
```
C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\bin
C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\libnvvp
C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\extras\CUPTI\libx64
C:\Program Files (x86)\NVIDIA Corporation\PhysX\Common
c:\tools\cuda\bin   # this is for cudnn64_6.dll
C:\Program Files\Anaconda3
C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\Scripts
C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\Library\bin
```

Can you please check if you have all corresponding directories in PATH?
